sentences.en: a lineal descendant of the company's founder
sentences.cn: 公司创始人的直系后裔

sentences.en: According to the old tradition, Romulus was the founder of Rome.
sentences.cn: 按照古老的传说, 罗穆卢斯是古罗马的建国者.

sentences.en: He is a lineal descendant of the company's founder.
sentences.cn: 他是公司创始人的直系后裔。

sentences.en: He is said to be the founder of modern astronomy.
sentences.cn: 他被誉为现代天文学的奠基人.

sentences.en: He is the founder of International Sports Management Limited.
sentences.cn: 他是国际体育管理有限公司的创始人。

sentences.en: He is the founder of the new theory for geological science.
sentences.cn: 他是地质科学新理论的创始者.

sentences.en: He was extolled as the founder of their Florentine school.
sentences.cn: 他被称颂为佛罗伦萨画派的鼻祖.

sentences.en: He was one of the founders of the university's medical faculty.
sentences.cn: 他是该大学医学院的创建人之一。

sentences.en: He was the founder and guiding spirit of New York's Shakespeare Festival.
sentences.cn: 他是纽约莎士比亚戏剧节的创始人及领导者。

sentences.en: Jesus was the founder of the Christian religion.
sentences.cn: 耶稣是基督教的创始人。

sentences.en: Perhaps that is because the Founder lies outside history.
sentences.cn: 那也许是因为奠基人已置身于历史之外.

sentences.en: the founder and president of the company
The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: The Third Reich survived the death of its founder by seven days.
sentences.cn: 第三帝国比它的缔造者多活了七天.

sentences.en: Their marriage began to founder soon after the honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻在蜜月之后不久便触礁了。

sentences.en: This removes it at once beyond the special care of the founder.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,它立即就可以摆脱创业人的特殊照料.
维珍公司富有冒险精神的创始人理查德∙布兰森

words.tran_cn: 基础；地基；基金会；根据；创立

trans.tran_cn: 创始人，建立者，翻砂工，蹄叶炎
trans.tran_en: someone who establishes a business, organization, school etc
to fail after a period of time because something has gone wrong

trans.tran_cn: 失败，倒塌，沉没：沉到水下，摔倒：跌倒
